Sinesis raises his arms and gets hit in the arm while protecting his face..=
.. "same team as Dark Mouse? the traitor! computer, fire upon dark Mouse wh=
en he arives!...." commands Sinesis.... "now you will pay, worshipper of He=
ll Beast!..." he said, swooping behind Mantella and attempting to roll her =
up in a Schoolboy Pin for some more beating.........

ge -----

aughs.... "nice one you are, but see how you go far.....ah! now i'm startin=
g to act like that rhyming bot! yuck!...." he said......he looked up at tth=
e autoguns.. "autoguns, target this one!..." he said, pointing to Mantella.=
